tool_description: Creates and defines roles with metadata, descriptions, and basic configuration for RBAC systems.

description.description: Detailed description of the role purpose

category.description: Role category: administrative, operational, readonly, custom

is_system_role.description: Whether this is a system-managed role

error_messages: Role name already exists: Choose a unique role name not currently in use.
Invalid category: Use one of [administrative, operational, readonly, custom].
Invalid priority level: Priority must be an integer between 1 and 10.
usage: Specify role_name, description, and category to create a new role definition. Set priority_level and is_system_role as needed.

role_id.description: Unique identifier for the created role
